definition: soft seat (= first class in PRC trains)
woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc

sentences.english: I bought two soft-seat tickets for Wuhan.
sentences.chinese: 我買了兩張去武漢的軟席票。

sentences.english: There is a soft berth in Compartment No. three.
sentences.chinese: 第3號包房有一個軟席臥鋪。
